titleStmt.title: At a Council held at Boston, September the seventeenth 1675 It having pleased the Holy God ... The governour and Council of this jurisdiction therefore ... do appoint and order the seventh day of the next moneth; to be a day of public humiliation, with fasting and prayer ...
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Council.
Massachusetts. Governor (1673-1679 : Leverett)

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: broadside torn with some loss of text.
Colonial seal at head of title.
Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
